home.page.what.we.do.section.title: What We Do
home.page.what.we.do.section.web.develop: We build fast, responsive, and modern websites tailored to your business needs, ensuring seamless performance across all devices.
home.page.what.we.do.section.mobile.apps: From iOS to Android, we create user-friendly mobile applications that engage customers and bring your ideas to life on the go.
home.page.what.we.do.section.digital.tra: Helping businesses modernize processes, integrate technology, and stay competitive in the digital-first world.
We provide expert advice and ongoing support to help you choose the right technology, optimize processes, and keep your systems running smoothly.
home.page.our.work.section.title: Our Work
“In a fast-paced world, stillness is a gift.”

Little Zen was born out of the need to create a digital space as calming as a yoga mat itself. We crafted a platform where every detail - from the color palette to the navigation flow - breathes serenity. It's more than a website; it's an invitation to pause, to reconnect, and to embrace mindfulness. Just as yoga unites body and soul, Little Zen unites design and purpose into a seamless, peaceful experience.
home.page.our.work.section.project.goals: “Dreams are only as strong as the steps we take toward them.”

MyGoals started with a simple question: What if we could make our goals feel closer, more achievable? We designed an application that transforms ambition into action, giving users not just a calendar, but a companion on their journey. Every feature was built to empower, encourage, and remind people that progress - no matter how small - is still progress. MyGoals is more than scheduling; it's about building the life you envision, one goal at a time.
home.page.our.work.section.project.ogled: “Some stories demand to be told, not for profit, but for change.”

Ogledalo Društva (The Mirror of Society) is a labor of heart. We created this portal pro bono, driven by the stories of resilience, courage, and human dignity. It's a space where the voices of people overcoming disabilities and societal challenges find their light. Every line of code was written with purpose - not to build a product, but to build hope. This project reminds us why technology matters most when it gives a voice to those who are too often unheard.

home.page.why.choose.us.section.title: Why Choose Us
home.page.why.choose.us.section.subtitle: At Memento Tech, we believe technology should be more then just work - it should inspire. We don't just deliver websites or apps, we craft digital experiences that leave a mark.
home.page.why.choose.us.section.adaptabl: Every project is unique. We listen, adapt, and shape solutions around your story.
home.page.why.choose.us.section.collabor: We're not just developers; we're collaborators invested in your long-term success.
home.page.why.choose.us.section.design: Clean, modern, and user-friendly interfaces that people actually love using.
home.page.why.choose.us.section.vision: From concept to launch (and beyond), we handle every detail so you can focus on your vision.
home.page.why.choose.us.section.meaning: Whether it's a business tool or a social cause, we bring passion and precision to make it meaningful.
home.page.why.choose.us.section.final.pa: Your idea deserves more than just code — it deserves care, creativity, and craftsmanship.
Let's bring it to life together.
